alert.note: Alert for Dent; Phelps (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dent and central Phelps Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 530 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Newburg, or 10 miles southwest of Rolla, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rolla, Salem, Doolittle, Newburg, Edgar Springs, Lenox, Bangert, Howes, Lecoma, Lake Spring and Anutt. This includes Interstate 44 near mile marker 168, and between mile markers 179 and 183. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
